participant_1.background:
I am an only child, but I have a large extended family who are all supportive of my dance team.
I had no children because I am too focused on my plans for world domination.
I just finished painting my nails.
I do my best in school, and I love to dance with my team when I have free time.
I grew up in the Midwest where I learned to work hard and play hard.

participant_2.background:
I'm not very close to my family, but I love my garden.
I am an adult who exercises every day to keep my heart and lungs healthy.
I enjoy drawing comics for my grandchildren to enjoy.
i hate that i got my brain from the dad i never met.
I'm looking for a home that is close to grocery stores so I can take advantage of my couponing skills.

content.text: Hi! I'm just finishing up painting my nails.  How are you today?
I am doing well! I just finished a workout and am looking forward to a cup of tea.  What are you up to later?
I'm going to dance practice with my dance team.  I'm really excited for it!
That's great! I love to dance.  I used to dance a lot when I was younger.
Really?  What kind of dancing did you do?
I did ballet and tap.  I also did some modern dance.
That's awesome!  I do hip hop and contemporary dance.
That sounds really fun!  I've always wanted to try hip hop.
You should!  It's a lot of fun.  I'm sure you'd be great at it.
Thanks!  I might just have to try it out sometime.
I'm sure you'd love it!  It's a great way to get exercise and have fun at the same time.
I'm sure I would!  I'm always looking for new ways to get exercise.
Well, if you ever decide to give it a try, let me know!  I'd be happy to help you out.
Thanks!  I'll keep that in mind.
